name: MHTOCSMMShock
title: MH TOC SMM ValueSet for the Shock Indicator
description: A list of ICD-10-CM and ICD-9-CM diagnosis codes for the Severe Maternal Morbidity Shock Indicator. The codes in the ValueSet should be monitored for changes as they vary by source and may be updated.

concept.display: Shock during or following labor and delivery
Cardiogenic shock
Hypovolemic shock
Other shock
Shock, unspecified
Anaphylactic shock, unspecified, initial encounter
Postprocedural shock unspecified, initial encounter
Postprocedural cardiogenic shock, initial encounter
Other postprocedural shock, initial encounter
Anaphylactic reaction due to adverse effect of correct drug or medicament properly administered, initial encounter
Major complications of anesthesia or sedation during labor and delivery
Major complications of anesthesia or sedation during labor and delivery, unspecified as to episode of care or not applicable
Major complications of anesthesia or sedation during labor and delivery, delivered, with or without mention of antepartum condition
Major complications of anesthesia or sedation during labor and delivery, delivered, with mention of postpartum complication
Major complications of anesthesia or sedation during labor and delivery, antepartum condition or complication
Major complications of anesthesia or sedation during labor and delivery, postpartum condition or complication
Other complications of anesthesia or sedation during labor and delivery
Other complications of anesthesia or sedation during labor and delivery, unspecified as to episode of care or not applicable
Other complications of anesthesia or sedation during labor and delivery, delivered, with or without mention of antepartum condition
Other complications of anesthesia or sedation during labor and delivery, delivered, with mention of postpartum complication
Other complications of anesthesia or sedation during labor and delivery, antepartum condition or complication
Other complications of anesthesia or sedation during labor and delivery, postpartum condition or complication
Anesthesia or sedation-induced hypotension during labor and delivery
Anesthesia or sedation-induced hypotension during labor and delivery, unspecified as to episode of care or not applicable
Anesthesia or sedation-induced hypotension during labor and delivery, delivered, with or without mention of antepartum condition
Anesthesia or sedation-induced hypotension during labor and delivery, delivered, with mention of postpartum complication
Anesthesia or sedation-induced hypotension during labor and delivery, antepartum condition or complication
Anesthesia or sedation-induced hypotension during labor and delivery, postpartum condition or complication
Shock due to anesthesia
Anaphylactic reaction due to correct medicinal substance properly administered
